org.assertj.swing.fixture

Class AbstractJPopupMenuInvokerFixture<S,T extends JComponent,D extends JComponentDriver>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.swing.fixture.AbstractComponentFixture<S,T,D>
      • org.assertj.swing.fixture.AbstractJComponentFixture<S,T,D>
        • org.assertj.swing.fixture.AbstractJPopupMenuInvokerFixture<S,T,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - used to simulate "self types." For more information please read "Emulating 'self types' using Java Generics to simplify fluent API implementation."
    T - the type of JComponent that this fixture can manage.
    D - the type of JComponentDriver that this fixture uses internally.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    JComponentFixture<S>, JPopupMenuInvokerFixture, MouseInputSimulationFixture<S>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractButtonFixture, JComboBoxFixture, JInternalFrameFixture, JLabelFixture, JListFixture, JScrollBarFixture, JScrollPaneFixture, JSliderFixture, JSpinnerFixture, JSplitPaneFixture, JTabbedPaneFixture, JTableFixture, JTextComponentFixture, JTreeFixture

    public abstract class AbstractJPopupMenuInvokerFixture<S,T extends JComponent,D extends JComponentDriver>
extends AbstractJComponentFixture<S,T,D>
implements JPopupMenuInvokerFixture
    Supports functional testing of JComponents capable of invoking JPopupMenus.
    Author:
    Alex Ruiz

      • showPopupMenu

        @Nonnull
public JPopupMenuFixture showPopupMenu()
        Shows a pop-up menu using this fixture's JComponent as the invoker of the pop-up menu.
        Specified by:
        showPopupMenu in interface JPopupMenuInvokerFixture
        Returns:
        a fixture that manages the displayed pop-up menu.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this fixture's JComponent is disabled.
        IllegalStateException - if this fixture's JComponent is not showing on the screen.
        ComponentLookupException - if a pop-up menu cannot be found.

        @Nonnull
public JPopupMenuFixture showPopupMenuAt(@Nonnull
                                        Point p)
        Shows a pop-up menu at the given point using this fixture's JComponent as the invoker of the pop-up menu.
        Specified by:
        showPopupMenuAt in interface JPopupMenuInvokerFixture
        Parameters:
        p - the given point where to show the pop-up menu.

        a fixture that manages the displayed pop-up menu.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this fixture's JComponent is disabled.
        IllegalStateException - if this fixture's JComponent is not showing on the screen.
